meanings.definition: The act of arranging or styling hair.
meanings.sent1: Hairstyling can completely change a person's appearance.
meanings.sent2: She learned hairstyling techniques at beauty school.
meanings.sent3: The hairstyling competition was a cut above the rest.
meanings.sent4: Her hairstyling skills were like magic, transforming dull hair into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The hairstyling session left her feeling confident and beautiful.

meanings.definition: The profession or practice of styling hair.
meanings.sent1: Hairstyling requires creativity and attention to detail.
meanings.sent2: He decided to pursue a career in hairstyling after years of practice.
meanings.sent3: The hairstyling industry is always buzzing with new trends.
meanings.sent4: In the world of hairstyling, she was a rising star.
meanings.sent5: His passion for hairstyling shone through in every haircut he gave.
